articles.title: Boomer Broekhoff lands big NBA shot with 76ers - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Brett Brown has added another Aussie to his Philadelphia roster to help Ben Simmons' team win a title.
articles.content:
"I am excited to be joining the @sixers and ready to help the team in the playoffs," the 29-year-old Broekhoff posted on social media.

articles.author: AAP
articles.title: Santiago delivers 14th Irish Derby for O'Brien - Racenet
articles.description: Santiago was a 14th winner of the Irish Derby for Aidan O'Brien - who trained the first four home in this year's Classic at the Curragh.
articles.content:
Santiago was a 14th winner of the Irish Derby for Aidan O'Brien - who trained the first four home in this year's Classic at the Curragh.
